sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ce9d6df82f112010ff344f2e2c99b684
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AnsibleErrorHandler</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Ansible Spoke Error Handler</description><name>AnsibleErrorHandler</name><script><![CDATA[var AnsibleErrorHandler = Class.create();
AnsibleErrorHandler.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    retrieveErrorMessage: function(code) {
        var errorCodeMsgs = {
            "unauthorized": "Invalid username or password.",
            "unauthorized_tower": "Invalid username or password/token or the token has expired.",
            "forbidden": "The user does not have sufficient permission to perform this action.",
            "host_unreacheable": "Failed to connect to the Host via SSH or Connection timed out.",
            "invalid_playbook": "Provided Playbook is invalid or not present.",
            "empty_playbook": "Playbook appears to be empty or not provided.",
            "invalid_host_pattern": "Provided Host Pattern is invalid.",
            "empty_host_pattern": "Host Pattern appears to be empty or not provided.",
            "invalid_playbook_or_become_user": "Either Playbook or Become User is invalid or not present.",
            "invalid_host_or_become": "Either Host Pattern or Become User is invalid.",
            "invalid_command_or_become": "Either Command or Become User is invalid or appears to be empty.",
            "license_expired": "License has expired.",

            // Create User/Update User
            "invalid_username": "Provided User Name is invalid.",
            "invalid_email": "Provided Email is invalid.",
            "invalid_user": "Provided User Name has already been used.",
            "empty_field": "Either User Name or Password appears to be empty.",
            "invalid_name_value": "Either First Name or Last Name is invalid.",
            "invalid_input": "Provided value for one of the inputs is invalid.",
            "invalid_user_id": "Provided User ID is invalid.",
            "invalid_first_name": "Provided First Name is invalid.",
            "invalid_last_name": "Provided Last Name is invalid.",

            // Get User/Delete User
            "invalid_id": "Provided User ID is invalid.",

            //LIst Users
            "invalid_field": "Provided Sort Query is invalid.",

            // Create Job Template
            "job_already_exits": "Provided Template Name already exists.",
            "invalid_template_name": "Provided Template Name is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_inventory": "Provided Inventory ID is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_project": "Provided Project ID is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_playbook": "Provided PlayBook Name is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_description": "Provided Description is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_limit": "Provided Limit is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_extra_vars": "Provided Extra Variables is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_start_at_task": "Provided Start At Task is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_job_tags": "Provided Job Tags is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_skip_tags": "Provided Skip Tags is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_host_config_key": "Provided Host Config Key is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_custom_virtualenv": "Provided Custom Virtual Environment is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_job_slice_count": "Provided Job Slice Count is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_timeout": "Provided Timeout is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_credential": "Provided Credential is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_vault_credential": "Provided Vault Credential is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_force_handler": "Provided Force Handler is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_use_fact_cache": "Provided Use Fact Cache is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_diff_mode_on_launch": "Provided Ask Diff Mode on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_variables_on_launch": "Provided Ask Variables on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_skip_tags_on_launch": "Provided Ask Skip Tags on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_job_type_on_launch": "Provided Ask Job Type on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_verbosity_on_launch": "Provided Ask Verbosity on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_inventory_on_launch": "Provided Ask Inventory on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_ask_credential_on_launch": "Provided Ask Credential on Launch is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_survey_enabled": "Provided Survey Enabled is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_become_enabled": "Provided Become Enabled is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_diff_mode": "Provided Diff Mode is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_allow_simultaneous": "Provided Allow Simultaneous is invalid.",
            "invalid_template_fork": "Provided Fork value is invalid.",
            "invalid_inputs": "Provided value for one of the inputs is invalid.",

            // Launch Job Template
            "invalid_job_template": "Provided Job Template ID is invalid.",

            // List Job Templates
            "invalid_sort_query": "Provided Sort Query is invalid.",

            //Run Ad Hoc Command
            "invalid_inventory": "Provided value for Inventory is invalid or Inventory record does not exist.",
            "invalid_credential": "Provided value for Credential is invalid or Credential record does not exist.",
            "no_module_arguments": "Provided value for Module Argument is blank or invalid.",
            "invalid_extra_vars": "Provided value for Extra Arguments JSON is blank or invalid.",

            //Get job 
            "invalid_job_id": "Provided Job ID is invalid.",

            //Cancel Job
            "job_status": "Provided Job ID is not in pending or running state.",

            //Schedule Job
            "invalid_rrule": "One or more inputs are invalid or not provided.",
            "invalid_count_until": "Occurrence and End Date Time cannot be used simultaneously.",
            "invalid_count": "Provided Occurrence is unsupported.",
            "invalid_schedule_job": "Provided Job Template ID is invalid.",
            "invalid_start_date_time": "Provided Start Date Time is invalid.",
            "job_template_id_exists": "Provided Job Template ID and Name already exists.",
            "invalid_repeat_frequency": "Provided Repeat Frequency is invalid.",
            "invalid_name": "Provided Name is invalid.",
            "invalid_schedule_manual": "Manual Project cannot have a schedule set."

        };
        for (var key in errorCodeMsgs) {
            if (key == code) {
                return errorCodeMsgs[key];
            }
        }
    },
    genericErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        //log error message
        //var temp = JSON.parse(inputs.response);
        var temp = inputs.response;
        outputs.error_message = temp.message;
        if (inputs.status_code == '401' && ((inputs.response.indexOf(
                'Authentication credentials were not provided.'
            ) != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf(
                'Authorization header not provided') != -1))) outputs
            .error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('unauthorized_tower');
        else if ((inputs.status_code == '403') && ((inputs.response.indexOf(
                'You do not have permission to perform this action'
            ) != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf(
                'Forbidden username/password combo'
            ) != -1))) outputs.error_message = this
            .retrieveErrorMessage('forbidden');
        else if (inputs.status_code == '404' && inputs.response.indexOf(
                'Resource not found') != -1) outputs.error_message =
            this.retrieveErrorMessage('resource_not_found');
        else if (inputs.status_code == '403' && inputs.response.indexOf(
                'License has expired.') != -1) outputs.error_message = this
            .retrieveErrorMessage('license_expired');
        //return the error message
        return outputs;
    },

    genericCLIErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        //log error message

        if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('Failed to authenticate with user') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('unauthorized');
        else if ((inputs.output.indexOf('Failed to connect to the host via ssh') != -1) && (inputs.output.indexOf('Permission denied') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('forbidden');
        else if (((inputs.output.indexOf('Failed to connect to the host via ssh: ssh') != -1) && (inputs.output.indexOf('Connection timed out') != -1)) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Failed to connect to the host via ssh: ssh') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('host_unreacheable');
        else
            outputs.error_message = inputs.error_message;

        //return the error message
        return outputs;
    },

    runPlaybookErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('You must specify a playbook file to run') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('empty_playbook');
        else if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('syntax error near unexpected token') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('bash: --check: command not found') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('unexpected EOF while looking for matching') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No such file or directory') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_playbook_or_become_user');
        else if (((inputs.error_message.indexOf('ERROR! the playbook') != -1) && (inputs.error_message.indexOf('could not be found') != -1)) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('agent does not appear to be a file') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('does not appear to be a file') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('ERROR! the playbook: /home/ec2-user does not appear to be a file Exit status: 1') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('ERROR! You must specify a playbook file to run Exit status: 5') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Exit status: 1') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('ERROR! Empty playbook, nothing to do') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_playbook');

        else
            this.genericCLIErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);

        return outputs;
    },

    runCommandErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';

        if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('command not found') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No action selected, at least one of --host, --graph or --list needs to be specified') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Could not match supplied host pattern') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No hosts matched') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No such file or directory') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Missing target hosts') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('unexpected end of file') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('syntax error near unexpected token') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Extraneous options or arguments') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_command_or_become');

        else
            this.genericCLIErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);

        return outputs;
    },

    listDeviceDetailsErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';

        if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('command not found') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No action selected, at least one of --host, --graph or --list needs to be specified') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Could not match supplied host pattern') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No hosts matched') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No such file or directory') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_host_pattern');
        else if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('Missing target hosts') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('empty_host_pattern');
        else if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('unexpected end of file') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('error: -u option requires') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Extraneous options or arguments') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('syntax error near unexpected token') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_host_or_become');

        else
            this.genericCLIErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);

        return outputs;
    },

    listInventoryErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';

        if ((inputs.error_message.indexOf('command not found') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('No action selected, at least one of --host, --graph or --list needs to be specified') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('syntax error') != -1) || (inputs.error_message.indexOf('Usage: ansible-inventory [options] [host|group]') != -1))
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_host_pattern');

        else
            this.genericCLIErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);

        return outputs;
    },

    createUserErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "400":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Enter a valid username.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than 150 characters.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('username') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_username');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('first_name') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_first_name');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('last_name') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_last_name');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Enter a valid email address.') != -1) || inputs.response.indexOf('email') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_email');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('A user with that username already exists.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_user');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('JSON parse error') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_input');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('This field may not be blank.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('empty_field');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than 30 characters.') != -1) || inputs.response.indexOf('first_name') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_name_value');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    getUserErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        if (inputs.status_code == '404' && inputs.response.indexOf('The requested resource could not be found.') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_id');
        else if (inputs.status_code == '404' && inputs.response.indexOf('"detail":"Not found."') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_id');
        else
            this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        return outputs;
    },

    updateUserErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if (inputs.response.indexOf('Not found.') != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_user_id');
                break;
            case "405":
                if (inputs.response.indexOf('Method') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf(' not allowed.') != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_user_id');
                break;
            case "400":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Enter a valid username.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than 150 characters.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('username') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_username');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('first_name') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_first_name');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('last_name') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_last_name');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Enter a valid email address.') != -1) || inputs.response.indexOf('email') != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_email');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than 30 characters.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_name_value');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('A user with that username already exists.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_user');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('JSON parse error') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_input');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('This field may not be blank.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('empty_field');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    deleteUserErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        if (inputs.status_code == '404' && inputs.response.indexOf('"detail":"Not found."') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_id');
        else
            this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        return outputs;
    },

    listUserErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        if (inputs.status_code == '400' && inputs.response.indexOf('User has no field named') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_field');
        else if (inputs.status_code == '500' && inputs.response.indexOf('A server error has occurred.') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_field');
        else
            this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        return outputs;
    },

    runAdHocErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "400":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Inventory matching query does not exist') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_inventory');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Credential matching query does not exist') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_credential');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('No argument passed to command module') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('No argument passed to shell module.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('no_module_arguments');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Cannot parse as JSON') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_extra_vars');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;

    },

   getAdHocStatusErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Not found') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('The requested resource could not be found') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_job_id');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },
    getJobErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status_code = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Not found') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('The requested resource could not be found') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_job_id');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },



    createJobTemplateErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "400":
                if (((inputs.response.indexOf('name') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('name') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_name');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('inventory') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Incorrect type. Expected pk value, received str.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('inventory') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Invalid pk') && (inputs.response.indexOf('object does not exist.') != -1))))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_inventory');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('project') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Incorrect type. Expected pk value, received str.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('project') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Invalid pk') && (inputs.response.indexOf('object does not exist.') != -1))))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_project');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('playbook') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)) || (inputs.response.indexOf('Playbook not found for project.') != -1) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('playbook') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_playbook');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('description') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_description');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('limit') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_limit');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('extra_vars') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Cannot parse as JSON ') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('extra_vars') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_extra_vars');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('start_at_task') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('start_at_task') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_start_at_task');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('custom_virtualenv') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid virtualenv in') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('custom_virtualenv') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_custom_virtualenv');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('job_tags') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('job_tags') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_job_tags');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('skip_tags') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('skip_tags') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_skip_tags');
                else if (((inputs.response.indexOf('host_config_key') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1)) || ((inputs.response.indexOf('host_config_key') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1)))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_host_config_key');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('job_slice_count') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('A valid integer is required.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_job_slice_count');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('timeout') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('A valid integer is required.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_timeout');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('vault_credential') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('A valid integer is required.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_vault_credential');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('credential') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('A valid integer is required.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_credential');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('force_handler') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_force_handler');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('use_fact_cache') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_use_fact_cache');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_diff_mode_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_diff_mode_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_variables_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_variables_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_skip_tags_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_skip_tags_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_job_type_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_job_type_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_verbosity_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_verbosity_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_inventory_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_inventory_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('ask_credential_on_launch') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_ask_credential_on_launch');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('survey_enabled') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_survey_enabled');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('become_enabled') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_become_enabled');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('diff_mode') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_diff_mode');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('allow_simultaneous') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_allow_simultaneous');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('forks') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this value is greater than or equal to 0.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_template_fork');

                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this field has no more than') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_inputs');

                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('JobTemplate with this (name) combination already exists.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('job_already_exits');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('This field may not be blank.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('empty_field');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Ensure this value is greater than or equal to 0.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('Cannot parse as JSON') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('Not a valid string.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid boolean.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('is not a valid virtualenv in') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_input');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Credential') != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf('does not exist') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('You must provide an SSH credential.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_credentials');
                else if ((inputs.response.indexOf('You must provide a vault credential.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_vault_credential');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    launchJobTemplateErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('The requested resource could not be found.') != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf('Not found.') != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_job_template');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    listJobTemplatesErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status_code = 'Error';
        if (inputs.status_code == '400' && inputs.response.indexOf('JobTemplate has no field named') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_sort_query');
        else if (inputs.status_code == '500' && inputs.response.indexOf('A server error has occurred.') != -1)
            outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_sort_query');
        else
            this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        return outputs;
    },


    listHostsInventoryErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf("Not found") != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf("The requested resource could not be found") != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_inventory');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },
    listInstanceGroupInventoryErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf("Not found") != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf("The requested resource could not be found") != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_inventory');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    cancelJobErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status_code = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {

            case "405":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf("Method") != -1) && (inputs.response.indexOf("not allowed") != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('job_status');
                break;
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Not found.') != -1) || inputs.response.indexOf('The requested resource could not be found') != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_job_id');
                break;

            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    scheduleJobErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {

            case "400":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf("rrule parsing failed validation") != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf("This field is required") != -1) || (inputs.response.indexOf("Not a valid string") != -1)) {
                    if (inputs.response.indexOf("rrule parsing failed validation: invalid 'FREQ': NOT") != -1)
                        outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_repeat_frequency');

                    else if (inputs.response.indexOf("name") != -1 && inputs.response.indexOf("Not a valid string.") != -1)
                        outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_name');

                    else
                        outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_rrule');
                } else if (inputs.response.indexOf("RRULE may not contain both COUNT and UNTIL") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_count_until');
                else if (inputs.response.indexOf("COUNT > 999 is unsupported") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_count');

                else if (inputs.response.indexOf("Valid DTSTART required in rrule") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_start_date_time');

                else if (inputs.response.indexOf("Schedule with this Unified job template and Name already exists.") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('job_template_id_exists');

                else if (inputs.response.indexOf("object does not exist") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_schedule_job');

                else if (inputs.response.indexOf("Manual Project cannot have a schedule set") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_schedule_manual');

                break;

            case "404":
                if (inputs.response.indexOf("The requested resource could not be found") != -1 || ((inputs.response.indexOf("detail") != -1) && inputs.response.indexOf("Not found") != -1))
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_schedule_job');
                break;

            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    relaunchJobErrorHandler: function(inputs, outputs) {
        outputs.status_code = 'Error';
        switch (String(inputs.status_code)) {
            case "404":
                if ((inputs.response.indexOf('Not found') != -1) || inputs.response.indexOf("The requested resource could not be found") != -1)
                    outputs.error_message = this.retrieveErrorMessage('invalid_job_id');
                break;
            default:
                this.genericErrorHandler(inputs, outputs);
        }
        return outputs;
    },

    type: 'AnsibleErrorHandler'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>luis.escobar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-22 22:34:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>ce9d6df82f112010ff344f2e2c99b684</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AnsibleErrorHandler</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ce9d6df82f112010ff344f2e2c99b684</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>luis.escobar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-22 22:34:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OAuthAnsibleTokenHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>OAuthAnsibleTokenHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var OAuthAnsibleTokenHelper = Class.create();
OAuthAnsibleTokenHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    interceptRequestParameters: function(requestParamMap) {
        this.preprocessAccessToken(requestParamMap);
    },

    parseTokenResponse: function(accessTokenResponse) {
        this.postprocessAccessToken(accessTokenResponse);
    },

    preprocessAuthCode: function(requestParamMap) {

        var reqProfile = gs.action.getGlideURI();
        var params = reqProfile.toString().split("?")[1];
        var values = params.split("&");

        for (var i = 0; i < values.length; i++)
            if (values[i].indexOf("oauth_provider_profile") != -1) {
                reqProfile = values[i].split("=")[1];
            }

        var gr = new GlideRecord("sn_ansible_spoke_token_mgmt");
        gr.addQuery('name', 'Ansible');
        gr.query();
        gr.next();
        gr.setValue('oauth_profile', reqProfile);
        gr.update();


    },

    preprocessAccessToken: function(requestParamMap) {},

    postprocessAccessToken: function(accessTokenResponse) {},


    type: 'OAuthAnsibleTokenHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>luis.escobar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-22 22:34:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>b5dda53c2f112010ff344f2e2c99b64d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OAuthAnsibleTokenHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b5dda53c2f112010ff344f2e2c99b64d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>luis.escobar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-22 22:34:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AnsibleUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Ansible Spoke Utils</description><name>AnsibleUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var AnsibleUtils = Class.create();
AnsibleUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    trimStringInputs: function(inputs) {
        for (var key in inputs) {
            if (inputs[key] && typeof inputs[key] == 'string') {
                inputs[key] = inputs[key].trim();
            }
        }
        return inputs;
    },
	
	validateJson: function(args) {
        try {
            JSON.parse(args);
			return args;
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided Extra Arguments JSON is invalid."
            );
        }
    },

    validateName: function(name) {
        try {
            if (name) {
                return encodeURI(name);
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "Provided Template Name is invalid."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided Template Name is invalid."
            );
        }
    },
	
    validateInventory: function(inventory) {
        try {
            if (inventory) {
                return encodeURI(inventory);
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "Provided Inventory ID is invalid."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided Inventory ID is invalid."
            );
        }
    },
    validateProject: function(project) {
        try {
            if (project) {
                return encodeURI(project);
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "Provided Project ID is invalid."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided Project ID is invalid."
            );
        }
    },
    validatePlayBook: function(playbook) {
        try {
            if (playbook) {
                return encodeURI(playbook);
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "Provided PlayBook Name is invalid."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided PlayBook Name is invalid."
            );
        }
    },

    errorCheckCLI: function(error_message) {
        if ((error_message.indexOf('Exit status') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('Failed to authenticate') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('Failed to set permissions') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('invalid user') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('Failed to connect to the host via ssh') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('Connection timed out') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('No hosts matched') != -1) ||
            (error_message.indexOf('job finished with status ERROR') != -1)) {

            return true;
        }
    },

    validateId: function(id) {
        try {

            if (id === '') {
                throw new Error("Provided ID is invalid.");
            } else if (/[^0-9]/.test(id)) {
                throw new Error("Provided ID is invalid.");
            } else {
                return id;
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error("Provided ID is invalid.");
        }
    },

    validateRrule: function(rule) {
        try {
            if (rule) {
                return rule;
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "One or more inputs are invalid or not provided."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "One or more inputs are invalid or not provided."
            );
        }
    },

    validateTemplate: function(id) {
        try {
            if (id) {
                return encodeURI(id);
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "Provided Job Template is invalid."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided Job Template is invalid."
            );
        }
    },
	
	validateJobID: function(id) {
        try {
            if (id) {
                return encodeURI(id);
            } else {
                throw new Error(
                    "Provided Job ID is invalid."
                );
            }
        } catch (err) {
            throw new Error(
                "Provided Job ID is invalid."
            );
        }
    },

    convertDateTimeFormat: function(date) {
        try {
            var cdate, temp1;
            temp1 = date.slice(0, 10);
            temp1 = temp1.replace(/-/g, '');
            cdate = temp1 + "T";

            temp1 = date.slice(11);
            temp1 = temp1.replace(/:/g, '');
            date = cdate.concat(temp1 + "Z");

            return date;
        } catch (e) {
            throw new Error("One or more inputs are invalid or not provided.");
        }
    },

    validateRuleDay: function(day) {
        try {
            var temp = [];
            temp = day.split(',');

            for (i = 0; i < temp.length; i++)
                temp[i] = temp[i].slice(0, 2);

            return temp;
        } catch (e) {
            throw new Error("One or more inputs are invalid or not provided.");
        }
    },
	
	validateRuleInterval: function(day) {
        try {
            if((!day) || (day == 0)){
				throw new Error("One or more inputs are invalid or not provided.");
			}
			else {
                return day;
            } 
        } catch (e) {
            throw new Error("One or more inputs are invalid or not provided.");
        }
    },

    type: 'AnsibleUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>luis.escobar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-22 22:34:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>b4cda53c2f112010ff344f2e2c99b649</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AnsibleUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b4cda53c2f112010ff344f2e2c99b649</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>luis.escobar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-22 22:34:31</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
